import sys
t=input()
while t:
	t-=1
	n=input()
	max_count=0
	strt=[int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().split()]
	end=[int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().split()]
	t1=min(strt)
	t2=max(end)+1
	for time in strt:
		count=0
		for i in xrange(n):
			if strt[i]<=time:
				if end[i]>time:
					count+=1
					if max_count<count:
						max_count=count
 
	print max_count
